abstract: JPMorgan Chase has been exploring strategic alternatives, including a possible sale or spinoff, for the business, which deals in physical commodities like metals and oil.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase has been exploring strategic alternatives, including a possible sale or spinoff, for the business, which deals in physical commodities like metals and oil.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – The Mercuria Energy Group, a fast-growing energy and commodities trading company, is in exclusive talks to acquire the physical commodities business of JPMorgan Chase, according to a person familiar with the discussions.

headline.main: Swiss Firm Mercuria in Talks to Buy JPMorgan’s Commodities Unit

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
